citations.narrative:
The recently acquired Savannah Cat, which is a hybrid of an exotic and domestic cat and therefore regulated under the
domestic cat regulations, was not identified as required under the regulations. The animal does not have a microchip to
be in compliance with the standing approval to use microchips in lieu of official tags and no official tags or records were
available for review. Each exhibitor shall identify all live dogs and cats under his or her control or on his or her premises
whether held purchased or otherwise acquired in accordance with the regulations.
Correct by 9 October 2025

The recent acquisition of a Savannah Cat, which is a hybrid of an exotic and domestic cat and therefore regulated under
the domestic cat regulations, was not documented on an APHIS 7005 and 7006 forms and was not accompanied by a
health certificate. The information was present on form 7019 and 7020, so all required information was available except
the health certificate. Each exhibitor shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the
required information concerning each dog and cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held or otherwise in his or
her possession or under his or her control.
Correct by 25 September, 2025

In Patty Kay the mountain lion's enclosure, the entrance to her shelter had wire points extending into the doorway through
which she passed through and could cause her injury. Outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by 25 September, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.50(c) 
   
Time and method of identification. 
The recently acquired Savannah Cat, which is a hybrid of an exotic and domestic cat and therefore regulated under the 
domestic cat regulations, was not identified as required under the regulations. The animal does not have a microchip to 
be in compliance with the standing approval to use microchips in lieu of official tags and no official tags or records were 
available for review. Each exhibitor shall identify all live dogs and cats under his or her control or on his or her premises 
whether held purchased or otherwise acquired in accordance with the regulations. 
Correct by 9 October 2025 
2.75(a) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors 
The recent acquisition of a Savannah Cat, which is a hybrid of an exotic and domestic cat and therefore regulated under 
the domestic cat regulations, was not documented on an APHIS 7005 and 7006 forms and was not accompanied by a 
health certificate. The information was present on form 7019 and 7020, so all required information was available except 
the health certificate. Each exhibitor shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the 
required information concerning each dog and cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held or otherwise in his or 
her possession or under his or her control. 
Correct by 25 September, 2025 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In Patty Kay the mountain lion's enclosure, the entrance to her shelter had wire points extending into the doorway through 
which she passed through and could cause her injury. Outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be 
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. 
Correct by 25 September, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
